sentences.sContent: He crammed all his books into the small bookcase.
sentences.sContent_eng: He crammed all his books into the small bookcase.
sentences.sCn: 他把他所有的书都塞进小书橱里。

sentences.sContent: That selfish student always appropriates the biggest bookcase and desk.
sentences.sContent_eng: That selfish student always appropriates the biggest bookcase and desk.
sentences.sCn: 那个自私的学生总是占用最大的书橱和书桌。

trans.tranOther: a piece of furniture with shelves to hold books
